creeps.description: Lane creeps and minion units for MOBA gameplay

bosses.description: Epic boss monsters and world bosses

vehicles.description: Ground, air, and space vehicle models

resource-depot.name: Resource Depot
resource-depot.description: Central storage facility for gathered resources with glowing status displays

solar-generator.name: Solar Generator
solar-generator.description: Harvests energy from the local star with rotating solar panels and glowing energy core

defense-turret.name: Defense Turret
defense-turret.description: Automated weapon platform that targets hostile entities with rotating barrel and sensors

habitat-dome.name: Habitat Dome
habitat-dome.description: Life support structure for colony inhabitants with geodesic dome and environmental systems

comm-beacon.name: Communications Beacon
comm-beacon.description: Long-range transmitter for colony coordination and distress signals

quantum-relay.name: Quantum Relay
quantum-relay.description: Advanced communication array that enables instant data transfer across dimensional barriers

warp-gate.name: Warp Gate
warp-gate.description: Interdimensional portal system capable of transporting matter across vast distances instantaneously

fusion-reactor.name: Fusion Reactor
fusion-reactor.description: High-output power generation facility using controlled nuclear fusion

refinery-complex.name: Refinery Complex
refinery-complex.description: Industrial processing facility that converts raw materials into refined resources

energy-matrix.name: Energy Storage Matrix
energy-matrix.description: Advanced capacitor array that stores and distributes power across the colony grid

perimeter-wall.name: Defensive Perimeter Wall
perimeter-wall.description: Reinforced modular barrier segment for colony perimeter defense

shield-generator.name: Plasma Shield Generator
shield-generator.description: Projects a protective energy field that absorbs incoming damage

proximity-mine.name: Proximity Mine Array
proximity-mine.description: Deployable explosive mine that detonates when enemies enter trigger radius

shadow-wraith.name: Shadow Wraith
shadow-wraith.description: Ethereal dark entity that phases through matter and drains life force

blood-knight.name: Blood Knight
blood-knight.description: Heavily armored warrior sustained by dark blood magic

forest-guardian.name: Forest Guardian
forest-guardian.description: Ancient tree spirit that protects sacred groves

crystal-golem.name: Crystal Golem
crystal-golem.description: Construct made of living crystals that refracts energy attacks

cave-bat.name: Cave Bat
cave-bat.description: Giant bat that uses echolocation to hunt in darkness

void-spider.name: Void Spider
void-spider.description: Arachnid from the void dimension that spins webs of darkness

forest-sprite.name: Forest Sprite
forest-sprite.description: Tiny nature spirit that can heal allies or curse enemies

rock-troll.name: Rock Troll
rock-troll.description: Massive stone-skinned brute with incredible regeneration

flame-serpent.name: Flame Serpent
flame-serpent.description: Fire elemental in serpentine form that leaves trails of burning ground

wolf-alpha.name: Alpha Wolf
wolf-alpha.description: Pack leader wolf with enhanced strength and leadership aura

ancient-wyrm.name: Ancient Wyrm
ancient-wyrm.description: Legendary dragon of immense age and power

storm-elemental.name: Storm Elemental
storm-elemental.description: Living lightning storm that calls down thunder from the skies

titan-golem.name: Titan Golem
titan-golem.description: Colossal construct guardian of ancient civilizations

void-colossus.name: Void Colossus
void-colossus.description: A titanic entity from the space between dimensions, capable of tearing reality apart

inferno-drake.name: Inferno Drake
inferno-drake.description: Ancient fire dragon that commands volcanic fury and molten destruction

corrupted-hivemind.name: Corrupted Hivemind
corrupted-hivemind.description: A collective consciousness of corrupted AI that absorbed thousands of rogue systems

grave-sentinel.name: Grave Sentinel
grave-sentinel.description: Animated skeleton warrior with glowing eye sockets, serving as basic undead fodder

voidwalker-cultist.name: Voidwalker Cultist
voidwalker-cultist.description: Robed figure with void runes emitting dark magical projectiles

spore-swarm.name: Bioluminescent Spore Swarm
spore-swarm.description: Colony of glowing spores that drift through alien atmospheres with eerie bioluminescence

iron-guardian.name: Rust-Corroded Iron Guardian
iron-guardian.description: Ancient factory sentinel covered in centuries of corrosion defending its industrial domain

void-phantom.name: Void-Touched Phantom
void-phantom.description: Spectral entity from between dimensions partially phasing in and out of reality

frost-elemental.name: Arctic Frost Elemental
frost-elemental.description: Living embodiment of glacial cold with crystalline form refracting prismatic auroras

sandworm.name: Desert Sandworm
sandworm.description: Massive segmented predator that burrows through sand dunes erupting to devour prey

magma-elemental.name: Volcanic Magma Elemental
magma-elemental.description: Living molten rock that flows and reforms with burning fury

lava-leech.name: Lava Leech
lava-leech.description: Small eel-like minion that swims through molten rock leaving burning trails

frost-scuttler.name: Frost Scuttler
frost-scuttler.description: Small insectoid ice crawler that scurries across frozen terrain in swarms

desert-wasp.name: Desert Wasp
desert-wasp.description: Flying insect predator that hunts in desert heat with venomous stinger

scout-rover.name: Scout Rover
scout-rover.description: Fast reconnaissance vehicle for terrain exploration

cargo-hauler.name: Cargo Hauler
cargo-hauler.description: Heavy transport for moving resources between locations

attack-speeder.name: Attack Speeder
attack-speeder.description: Light combat vehicle with rapid-fire weapons

hover-transport.name: Hover Transport
hover-transport.description: Anti-gravity personnel carrier for rough terrain

mining-mech.name: Mining Mech

abyssal-submersible.name: Abyssal Submersible
abyssal-submersible.description: Deep-sea exploration vessel with pressure resistance and bioluminescent navigation

viper-interceptor.name: Viper Interceptor
viper-interceptor.description: Ultra-lightweight dogfighter with advanced maneuvering thrusters for aerial combat

medic-hovercraft.name: Medic Hovercraft
medic-hovercraft.description: Rapid medical evacuation and trauma response platform with healing capabilities

robot-scout-drone.name: Scout Drone MK-VII
robot-scout-drone.description: Agile reconnaissance unit with advanced sensor arrays and twin hover engines

robot-assault-walker.name: Assault Walker X-12
robot-assault-walker.description: Bipedal combat mech armed with dual plasma cannons and heavy armor plating

robot-heavy-tank.name: Siege Tank Omega
robot-heavy-tank.description: Heavily armored main battle tank with devastating railgun turret

robot-gunship.name: Valkyrie Gunship

robot-support-medic.name: Field Medic Unit MED-9
robot-support-medic.description: Specialized medical support drone with nanite repair systems and emergency shield projectors

robot-stealth-assassin.name: Phantom Infiltrator
robot-stealth-assassin.description: Elite assassination unit with optical camouflage and mono-molecular blades

robot-artillery-mech.name: Thunderstrike Artillery
robot-artillery-mech.description: Long-range bombardment platform with quad missile racks and orbital strike designator

hostile-swarmer.description: Small, fast-moving corrupted organisms that attack in overwhelming numbers

hostile-spitter.name: Acid Spitter
hostile-spitter.description: Grotesque ranged attacker that launches corrosive acid globs

hostile-brute.name: Corruption Brute
hostile-brute.description: Massive bio-organic behemoth with fused bone armor and devastating melee attacks

hostile-lurker.description: Nightmare predator that emerges from shadows with bioluminescent patterns creating disorienting illusions

hostile-carrier.name: Hive Carrier
hostile-carrier.description: Bloated carrier organism that births swarmers mid-combat with protective carapace and larval chambers

boss-robot-prime.name: PRIME Unit Alpha-Omega
boss-robot-prime.description: The ultimate robot creation - massive combat chassis with advanced AI, devastating weapons and regenerating shields

boss-swarm-queen.name: The Swarm Queen
boss-swarm-queen.description: Massive hive mother with psychic control over all corrupted organisms - births endless waves of swarmers

boss-void-harbinger.name: Void Harbinger
boss-void-harbinger.description: Entity from the space between dimensions that tears reality itself - gazing too long unravels sanity

plasma-rifle.description: Standard issue energy weapon with moderate damage output

energy-shield.name: Energy Shield
energy-shield.description: Personal force field generator for defense

jetpack.description: Personal flight system for vertical mobility

healing-injector.description: Medical device that rapidly repairs tissue damage

data-core.name: Data Core
data-core.description: Ancient storage device containing valuable information

plasma-blade.description: Close-range energy melee weapon with glowing plasma edge for high-skill combat

photon-cannon.description: Heavy two-handed weapon firing powerful energy spheres with area-of-effect impact
